Stiker 3M Banyak Dipalsukan, Begini Cara Membedakan Produk Asli
06 Nov 2019, 23:05 by Antara, Eko Ari Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Di pasaran stiker 3M telah mengalami pemalsuan. General Manager PT. Nusindoprima Indah Sapto Nugroho mengatakan konsumen perlu mengenali stiker asli 3M sehingga dapat mendapatkan manfaat produk seperti daya tahan yang lama.
"Karena banyak produk yang tidak orisinal saat ini di pasar. Stiker 3M memiliki logo ICE di sisi dalam sehingga tidak dapat dihapus," kata Sapto di Jakarta, Rabu 6 November 2019.
Selain logo, stiker 3M juga memiliki daya kerekatan yang cukup lama. Sapto mengatakan salah satu ciri stiker yang palsu yaitu memiliki warna yang cukup cerah. "Kalau produk yang palsu, logo ICE itu ada di bagian luar, jadi mudah dihapus," ujar Sapto.
Konsumen, menurut Sapto, juga perlu memperhatikan lokasi pembelian stiker 3M sehingga mereka tidak terjebak membeli produk palsu yang cenderung berwarna lebih terang.
"Ciri yang paling kasat mata, produk itu kalau direflektif-kan sekilas memang tidak bisa diketahui asli atau palsu. Sekilas mirip saja, bahkan mereka lebih terang. Kami memiliki alat yang dapat melihat sesuai dengan peraturan yang dikeluarkan oleh pemerintah," katanya.
"Langkah yang terakhir itu, harga jual yang tidak masuk akal. Kami menjual satu rol stiker itu seharga Rp1,1 juta dengan panjang 50 meter. Mereka bisa menjual stiker dengan haarga yang sadis, yakni Rp 500 ribu saja," ujar Sapto.

Many 3M Stickers Are Forged, Here's How to Differentiate Original Products
06 Nov 2019, 23:05 by Antara, Eko Ari Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - 3M's sticker market has been falsified. General Manager of PT. Nusindoprima Indah Sapto Nugroho said consumers need to recognize 3M's original stickers so they can get product benefits such as long durability.
"Because many products are not original at the moment on the market. The 3M sticker has the ICE logo on the inside so it cannot be removed," Sapto said in Jakarta, Wednesday, November 6, 2019.
In addition to the logo, 3M stickers also have a long adhesion. Sapto said that one of the characteristics of the fake sticker is that it has a pretty bright color. "If the product is fake, the ICE logo is on the outside, so it's easy to remove," said Sapto.
Consumers, according to Sapto, also need to pay attention to the location of purchasing 3M stickers so that they are not stuck buying fake products that tend to be lighter colors.
"The most visible feature, if the product is reflected at a glance, it can not be known as genuine or fake. At a glance similar, even they are brighter. We have tools that can see according to regulations issued by the government," he said.
"The last step is the unreasonable selling price. We sell one roll of the sticker for Rp1.1 million with a length of 50 meters. They can sell stickers with sadistic prices, which is only Rp. 500 thousand," said Sapto.
